Module de.cuioss.java.tools

Package de.cuioss.tools.io

package de.cuioss.tools.io
Provides a number of io related utilities
Author:
Oliver Wolff
  • Class
    Description
    ClassPathLoader
    Variant of FileLoader that loads files from the classpath.
    FileLoader
    Wraps different ways file loading: FileSystem (absolute), Classpath,..
    FileLoaderUtility
    Utility class for dealing with generic / classpath related file access.
    FilenameUtils
    Copied from commons.io:org.apache.commons.io.FilenameUtils
    FileReaderWriter
    Combined interface for file loading and writing: FileLoader, FileWriter
    FileSystemLoader
    File-system based variant.
    FileTypePrefix
    Utility class to define file type prefixes.
    FileWriter
    Interface for file writer operations.
    IOCase
    Enumeration of IO case sensitivity.
    IOStreams
    Provides a number of utilities in context InputStream and OutputStreams.
    MorePaths
    Provides Path related utilities
    MorePaths.FileWriteHandler
    Command pattern interface delegating the file write operation to its caller.
    StructuredFilename
    Helper class for splitting / interacting with Filename and corresponding suffixes.
    UrlLoader
    This FileLoader takes a URL as its parameter which is useful when e.g.
